control_command.label: Command
control_command.tooltip: The main command to control the scoreboard. If none is given it defaults to !score.

control_permission.label: Permission
control_permission.tooltip: Who can use the scoreboard command.

control_permission_info.label: Permission Info
control_permission_info.tooltip: Input username when User_Specific is selected as required permission.

response_score_total.label: Total Score Response
response_score_total.tooltip:
The message the bot will announce when using:
!score.

{0} is player 1 name
{1} is player 1 score
{2} is player 2 name
{3} is player 2 score.

response_score_player.label: Player Individual Score Response
response_score_player.tooltip:
The message the bot will announce when using:
<cmd> [p1 | p2 | <name>]

{0} is player name
{1} is player score.

response_score_update.label: Score Update
response_score_update.tooltip:
The message the bot will announce when using:
<cmd> [p1 | p2 | <name>] [+ | - | <number>]

{0} is player name
{1} is player score.

response_name_update.label: Name Update
response_name_update.tooltip:
The message the bot will announce when using:
<cmd> setname [p1 | p2] <name>

{0} is either 'Player 1' or 'Player 2'
{1} is that players new name.

response_scoreboard_show.label: Show Scoreboard Response
response_scoreboard_show.tooltip:
The message the bot will announce when using:
<cmd> show

response_scoreboard_hide.label: Hide Scoreboard Response
response_scoreboard_hide.tooltip:
The message the bot will announce when using:
<cmd> hide

response_score_clear.label: Clear Score Data Response
response_score_clear.tooltip:
The message the bot will announce when using:
<cmd> clear

override_width.label: Override Scoreboard Width
override_width.tooltip:
Overrides the automatic width to fix the size of the scoreboard regardless of name width. If set too short long names will be clipped off behind the seperator.

Set to 0 to disable.

color_scoreboard_showborder.label: Show Border
color_scoreboard_showborder.tooltip: To show or not to show the border around the scoreboard.
